Name: AttImam
Description: AttImam was developed by Al-Imam Mohammad Ibn Saud Islamic University and consists of approximately 2,000 attribution relations applied to Arabic newswire text from Arabic Treebank: Part 1 v 4.1 (LDC2010T13). Attribution refers to the process of reporting or assigning an utterance to the correct speaker.
Provider: Al-Imam Mohammad Ibn Saud Islamic University
Tasks: discourse analysis, entity extraction, language identification
Authors: Amal Alsaif, Tasniem Alyahya, Madawi Alotibi, Huda Almuzaini, Abeer Alqahtani
